name: AnimatedScale
desc: Animated version of [Transform.scale] which automatically transitions the child's scale over a given duration whenever the given scale changes.

fields.name: child
fields.desc: The widget below this widget in the tree.

fields.name: alignment
fields.desc: The alignment of the origin of the coordinate system in which the scale takes place, relative to the size of the box.

fields.name: filterQuality
fields.desc: The filter quality with which to apply the transform as a bitmap operation.

nodes.name: Scaling Animation Effect
desc: In this case, drag to adjust the scale parameter to view the animation effect.
